module.name: skrill
module.description: Secure online payments for your business. Take advantage of a modern, flexible, and optimized payment solution- all with one contract, one integration and free setup
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Secure online payments for your business. Take advantage of a modern, flexible, and optimized payment solution- all with one contract, one integration and free setup.
module.additional_description: Free and quick setupAccess credit cards, 20+ local payment methods and support for over 80 banksTake advantage of the Skrill multi-currency account, giving you access to 40+ currenciesHigh-security standards and anti-fraud technologySeamless payment experience across mobile, tablet and desktopConnect with millions of Skrill account holders

module.name: paypal
module.description: This free official PayPal module can help you grow your sales by adding PayPal and PayPal Pay Later options to your store
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: This free official PayPal module can help you grow your sales by adding PayPal and PayPal Pay Later options to your store. With millions of users in over 200 markets, PayPal is one of the most trusted and familiar brands in the world.
module.additional_description: Activate easilyWith PayPal, you can start accepting payments quickly without any set-up fee. Include Pay Later options at no extra cost to your businessPay Later lets customers pay over time while you get paid upfront. [1] PayPal's pay later options are helping boost merchant conversion rates and cart sizes by 39% [2] Promote Pay Later on your siteLet customers know they have the flexibility to buy now and pay later by adding Pay Later promotional messaging and Pay Later button to your site. Offer fast checkout with less frictionStreamlined checkout helps reduce cart abandonment, drive conversion rates, and encourage repeat business. With PayPal, customers can use their saved billing and shipping info to check out faster — on any device. Get best-in-class fraud detectionPayPal helps you handle the risk of fraudulent transactions with our fraud, chargeback, and Seller Protection [3] capabilities (on eligible transactions). Our AI technology works hard to monitor your transactions – so you can focus on what matters most. Access funds quickly. After a customer completes their PayPal transaction, you’re quickly credited while the payment is processing. Funds settle directly into your PayPal business account. PayPal is one of the world’s most trusted, and familiar brands [4]Millions of global users20+ years of experience200+ markets around the world100+ different currencies  [1] PayPal Pay Later eligibility and availability is subject to merchant status, sector and integration. Consumer eligibility is subject to status and approval. Product features differ by market. See relevant product terms for more details.https://www.paypal.com/uk/webapps/mpp/paypal-payin3/terms[2] PayPal Q2 earnings 2021.[3] Available on eligible purchases. Limits apply. https://www.paypal.com/us/webapps/mpp/ua/useragreement-full[4] Morning Consult - The 15 Most Trusted Brands Globally. March 2021.

module.name: fraudlabspro
module.description: This module helps to screen your order transaction for online frauds
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: This module helps to screen your order transaction for online frauds.
module.additional_description: This module helps to screen your order transaction for online frauds. The sophisticated and advanced engines help you to thoroughly scan through all elements, such as geolocation, proxy, email, blacklisted, BIN, velocity, and many more to accurately identify potential fraud order. This module came with one month Mini Plan license, that allowing you 1500 queries/month. After the purchase, please contact FraudLabs Pro to unlock the license.

module.name: cronjobs
module.description: Focus on your business and do not lose time working on minor tasks: automate it!
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Focus on your business and do not lose time working on minor tasks: automate it!
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Save time: turn simple jobs into programmed tasks you won’t have to care about too much.Schedule your needs: and make it automatically done, easy-peasy!Handle all these tasks: have it all listed at the same place to better manage each job and create new ones if needed.

module.name: onboarding
module.description: The OnBoarding module greets first-time users to their PrestaShop back office: through a small playful interface, it shows the user how to launch his/her shop in several easy steps
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: The OnBoarding module greets first-time users to their PrestaShop back office: through a small playful interface, it shows the user how to launch his/her shop in several easy steps.

module.name: jmarketplace
module.description: Create your own marketplace allowing your customers register as sellers for sell their products in exchange for a commission
module.author: JA Modules
module.description_full: Create your own marketplace allowing your customers register as sellers for sell their products in exchange for a commission.
module.additional_description: We are quality leaders and PrestaShop experts with more than 15 years of experience in the sector and we can guarantee that this product can help you a lot to get the goal you want. We know and like what we do, that's why we offer you the best of us, in a very complete product and at the best price. Our module, your trust marketplace. This module is synonymous with analysis, constant work and innovation. We always listen to your suggestions and requests to improve it and make a more competent, complete product with a good technical support team that is attentive to solve all doubts and problems, always giving the best possible result. Benefits for administrator Expansion catalog with products from other sellers.More sales possibilities.More offer for customers.Compatible with any payment method.All customer purchases are received by the market. When appropriate, vendor commissions can be paid.Very complete management of sellers, products, commissions, etc.Very complete control panel or dashboard where you will be able to see all the market advances.Fixed commission per sale.Variable commission by seller, category or levels (Bronze, Silver and Gold).Super complete configuration per page or functionality. You will not have to modify the code to enable or disable functions on the front.Communication system between client, seller and administrator through the platform.Compatible with most of the available themes. It is ideal to choose a theme that it has been developed with Bootstrap 3 technology or higher. Benefits for the seller Easy and intuitive product management.Export and import products en masse.Management of the seller profile.Commission history.Order history and management.Creates your own carriers and shipping rates.Selection of the preferred payment method to collect your commissions.Graph of commissions received.Request for withdrawal of funds.Centralized marketplace message box.

module.name: magnalister
module.description: Effortlessly sell on Amazon, eBay, and various global marketplaces straight from your shop
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: Effortlessly sell on Amazon, eBay, and various global marketplaces straight from your shop. magnalister streamlines uploading products and automates follow-up tasks like order imports, price-inventory matching, and beyond for a smoother operation.
module.additional_description: Easily integrate your PrestaShop with major online marketplaces like Amazon, eBay, and others through magnalister, and take advantage of essential features including product uploads, order imports, price and inventory synchronization, order status reconciliation, invoice creation and distribution, along with numerous automation capabilities. As of April 2024, we support a diverse array of platforms: Amazon, eBay, Cdiscount, Rakuten FR, Etsy, OTTO, METRO, Kaufland.de, Ricardo, hood.de, plus price comparison sites such as Check24 and idealo. We're constantly expanding our network, adding more high-traffic national and international marketplaces, and regularly enhancing the functionality of the magnalister PrestaShop Addon to meet your evolving needs. Discover the full potential of magnalister with a 30-day free trial, and explore the complete suite of features without any cost!

module.name: advancedeucompliance
module.description: This module helps European merchants comply with applicable e-commerce laws
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: This module helps European merchants comply with applicable e-commerce laws.

module.name: ndk_steppingpack
module.description: Sell products from your catalog, by including them in packs composing "step by step"
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Sell products from your catalog, by including them in packs composing "step by step". This module will allow you to create product packs to compose your customers among selections in your catalog.
module.additional_description: Increase sales of targeted products in your catalog. Increase the value of the basket of your visitors by influencing on sets of products. Guide your customers in the selection of your products. With this module you create as many steps as you want, each with an arbitrary selection of products. For each step you set a minimum rule adding to cart. Once validated rule, your customer can go to the next step. Once all the steps validated, your customer can finalize the order and receive the discount you have set in your pack! New: fix a price for your pack, the system automatically created a product pack and synchronize your stocks.

module.name: oneandonehosting
module.description: At 1&1 youll find the perfect hosting package for your needs. And thanks to convenient 1-click installation, setting up PrestaShop is especially easy Please find more information here
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: At 1&1 youll find the perfect hosting package for your needs. And thanks to convenient 1-click installation, setting up PrestaShop is especially easy Please find more information here.
module.additional_description: Further advantages you can benefit from with 1&1 New Hosting:Choose from 40 Click & Build Apps including PrestaShop1&1 Expert App Support available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week with advice and practical help specific to the application youre usingMaximum availability thanks to the geo-redundant hosting of your website in two geographically separate data centres1&1 SiteLock included, keeping your website virus-freeGuaranteed performance from 2 GB RAM (with the 1&1 Unlimited Plus package) Domain included free with select packages (.co.uk, .com, .net, .org, .me.uk or .org.uk)Unlimited power: Unlimited webspace, traffic, and MySQL databases

module.name: smartsupp
module.description: Drive your online sales through conversations, and automate sales with Smartsupp
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Drive your online sales through conversations, and automate sales with Smartsupp. We offer everything you need to grow your online sales: AI, LeadGen chatbots, live chat, and much more you can use to engage your visitors at the right time.
module.additional_description: Jumpstart your sales and boost conversions with Smartsupp. Our packages offer everything you need: AI, LeadGen chatbots, and live chat to help you turn visitors into customers. Automate responses to repetitive questions and provide a personal touch when it matters the most. Gain insights into your customer service with accurate statistics – track customer satisfaction, agents' performance efficiency, and more. If you want to use one of the world's most trusted live chat and chatbot apps, use Smartsupp.  We currently power up over 100,000 webshops and websites so they can better:Chat with customers and build powerful relationships. Our easy-to-install, fast chat box is complemented by Messenger, and email, so every conversation is accessible via our mobile apps.Convert visitors into customers by running powerful lead gen campaigns with automated messages and chatbots.Engage both customers and visitors with our AI-powered sales and care assistants who are always available and ready to help.Understand the conversation flow, how happy your customers are with your team and offering, and what they ask about – but also who converts and who requires your attention. What our users say about us? "Smartsupp helps us to make our online shop even more successful! After a simple installation, we immediately had the first customer with a question, who then ordered straight away."—Oke Harms, Kickerkult.de "With Smartsupp we use one chat in several shops! Thanks to them, we have been able to improve our contact with customers. Communication is instant and convenient for both us and the customers."—Katarzyna, Wujo.pl “70 % of our orders comes through live chat”-Irena IROVNICKÁ, Customer care team leader Unuo Design

badge.label: Customer satisfaction: Partner of the year

module.name: crisp
module.description: Crisp is the all-in-one platform for customer support dedicated to Prestashop merchants
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Crisp is the all-in-one platform for customer support dedicated to Prestashop merchants. The platform comes with a live chat widget, an AI Chatbot and many other features that deeply integrates with your Prestashop online store.
module.additional_description: Transform your customer service into a new acquisition's channel Crisp is a multichannel customer experience platform that helps online store to centralize inbound messages to land into one inbox, allowing merchants to avoid switching back and forth between Facebook, Instagram, Email Inbox or WhatsApp and phone calls. Through a powerful data synchronization between Prestashop and Crisp, merchants can create personnalized and unique support experience. No matter customer's state, retailers will aways stay ahead. The platform offers ready-to-use tools that will make online merchants ready and powerful today, not in a month: Sales and FAQ chatbot templates, empowered by AI and trained on product data are designed to increase revenue and answer repetitive customer's questions. Through a flat-rate pricing, merchants using Crisp for Prestashop can preserve their margins while scaling their customer support process. All-in-all, Crisp for Prestashop doesn't only provide a live chat, an AI Chatbot or a shared inbox: It's full suite of tools dedicated at making online merchants more efficient in their daily customers' relationship tasks. How does Crisp stands out from the crowd?- 55% resolution rate powered by Crisp AI Chatbot- 100% no-code solution to empower teams from any sector- Lightweight chat widget made not to slowdown website loading speed- Free mobile and desktop iOs & Android app- Flat-rate pricing on all our plans- In-house AI models for better privacy-driven companies Simple things you can do to scale your customer support in less than 5 minutes- Decrease bounce rate and CPC with proactive and personnalized chat messages- Improve average number of conversations per agent by creating templated message that leverage dynamic data shared through Prestashop data- Connect channels such as emails, Instagram DMs or Messenger to your Crisp inbox- Build bots to automate repetitive questions on any channels thanks to ready-to-use chatbot templates- Train AI models on custom data such as website data, product data or conversational data. Numbers behind Crisp- 500 000 customers around the world- 50+ languages available- 210 000 000 users each month- 24/5 customer support available in 5 different languages

module.name: mailchimppro
module.description: Mailchimp is an always-on marketing platform for small businesses. Create unique campaigns, automate your busy work, get smarter as you go
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Mailchimp is an always-on marketing platform for small businesses. Create unique campaigns, automate your busy work, get smarter as you go. Increase your revenue potential by adding the Mailchimp module for free.
module.additional_description: Increase your revenue potentialWhen you connect your Prestashop store to Mailchimp, you unlock features that can help you increase revenue and drive conversion. Mailchimps all-in-one marketing platform makes it easy to build and execute multi-channel marketing campaigns that drive sales.Increase traffic to your site and drive repeat purchasesMailchimp tools not only help you increase traffic to your site but with the Customer Relationship Management (CRM) features you can start building stronger relationships with your customers with content that means something to them.Understand what works so you can amplify your effortsWith a connected store, you bring your ecommerce and marketing data into one centralized place. This allows you the ability to understand the ROI of your marketing efforts so you can best optimize your marketing strategy.

module.name: psaddonsconnect
module.description: 2 in 1: Make security or functional updates easier for all modules in your store and take advantage of an e-commerce tip each week to help you on your way
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: 2 in 1: Make security or functional updates easier for all modules in your store and take advantage of an e-commerce tip each week to help you on your way.
module.additional_description: Once connected to your PrestaShop Addons account with this module, you:will benefit each week from an e-commerce tip, that is a tip to follow related to the e-commerce calendar, which you will find directly on your dashboard (ex: when and how to prepare for Black Friday, back to school promotions, etc.)protect your store by staying up-to-date with the latest on security for modules you have downloaded from PrestaShop Addonstake advantage of new features added to modules you have downloaded from PrestaShop Addons

module.name: trustpilot
module.description: Collect and showcase verified reviews that consumers trust on Trustpilot's review platform
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Collect and showcase verified reviews that consumers trust on Trustpilot's review platform. Automatically invite customers to leave reviews and showcase your store's rating onsite with a drag-and-drop tool.
module.additional_description: Trustpilot is an open-to-all reviews platform where consumers are heard by businesses, and where businesses can earn consumer trust. Grow your business with genuine content that comes directly from the people who matter most—your customers. Trustpilot for PrestaShop Trustpilot’s integration for PrestaShop lets merchants trigger service and product review invitations to customers automatically. Use the TrustBox tool to drag-and-drop reviews and ratings widgets on your site at key conversion points. Read on for what more you can do with a Trustpilot account. Grow a trusted brand Invite your customers to share feedback at the ideal moment. Authentic content generated from your customers helps drive your SEO ranking and increases traffic to your site.Collect reviews on your Trustpilot profile pages, which frequently appear on the first page of search engines.Grow on Google with verified reviews that count toward Google Seller Ratings. Product reviews enhance and qualify your product pages for review snippets in organic search. Increase purchasing conversion and grow revenue Turn real reviews from real customers into real conversion drivers. Showcase reviews across your website when consumers are actively looking to make a purchase decision.Get consumers talking by sharing your reviews anywhere you engage with consumers—paid ads, email, social, and out-of-home. Give potential customers the confidence they need throughout their journey.Showcase reviews in ad creative without design skills with our Image Generator. Increase customer retention and maximize LTV Learn from customers to optimize and improve your service and products. Identify trends in customer sentiment across product inventory, customer service, shipping, price, and more.Respond to reviews and prove you take customer feedback seriously to turn first time buyers into repeat customers and your best advocates.Keep customers coming back with an ever-improving product selection. Product Attributes ratings help you understand your products from your customer’s point-of-view. Get started with a free accountWhether you’re just getting started or you’re already an expert at engaging and building trust with your customers, we can help. A free account gives businesses the tools needed to start collecting, managing, and showcasing reviews. Sign up for a Standard Plan to upgrade your profile page, invite more customer reviews, access the Customer Success team, learn from detailed review analysis, use more TrustBox widgets onsite, produce marketing assets, and get the option to upgrade with Add-on Modules. Read more about our Plans and Add-on Modules: business.trustpilot.com/plans

module.name: cedwish
module.description: The official Wish integration makes it easier than ever to list and sell your products on the world's leading mobile e-commerce platform
module.author: CedCommerce
module.description_full: The official Wish integration makes it easier than ever to list and sell your products on the world's leading mobile e-commerce platform.
module.additional_description: The Wish module will empower you to become a global seller with easejust create a single product listing to reach customers in more than 100 countries.Wish is the most downloaded app globally for three of the past four years, Wish provides merchants with easy access to more than 100 million monthly active users across the globe (source: Sensor Tower).Unlike most marketplaces more than 70% of sales on Wish do not originate from search queries. Wishs unique algorithm helps find the users that are most likely to buy your productsand we place your products front and center for them.

module.name: mrshopapi
module.displayName: Ecommerce Native App for iOS & Android
module.description: With this module you can get the native iOS & Android Mobile App for your Prestashop Ecommerce site!Increase your sales, build customer loyalty and send free push notifications thanks to the Mobil
module.author: Mr. APPs
module.description_full: With this module you can get the native iOS & Android Mobile App for your Prestashop Ecommerce site!Increase your sales, build customer loyalty and send free push notifications thanks to the Mobile App of your Ecommerce.
module.additional_description: Automatic SYNC PrestashopThanks to the integration with your Prestashop store, products, orders, users, payments will be automatically synchronized, making the management of the mobile application incredibly simple. With the iOS & Android mobile App of your Ecommerce you can:  Increase sales of your products Reward your customers thanks to free push notifications Send promotions and news on your customers' smartphone Get visibility on the Apple AppStore and Google PlayStore Take advantage of the power of a native mobile app for your business Stand out from the competition Offer an innovative tool appreciated by your customers

module.name: sumuppaymentgateway
module.description: Card payments made simple with SumUp.  SumUp's vision is to create a world where all businesses can be successful doing what they love
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Card payments made simple with SumUp.  SumUp's vision is to create a world where all businesses can be successful doing what they love. SumUp supports merchants with tailor-made business tools created specifically for SMEs.
module.additional_description: Provides a fast and easy payment method suitable to your customers. Attractive and trustworthy user interfaceSeamless and fast registration, and easy configuration No hidden feesSafe and reliable paymentsLower chargeback rates thanks to 3D-SecureAll payments processed with SumUp in one sales history (both offline and online)Get a free SumUp Business Account to manage all your funds easilyReceive a free MasterCard with your merchant account for easy access to your fundsEasy-to-use SumUp App to manage all of your payment options and finances in one placeConnect to hundreds of integrations through the SumUp Partners platform  SumUp gives businesses a toolkit to run their entire operation. The extensive product suite includes stylish card readers, SumUp Business Account and Card, Online and remote payment options, invoicing, and point-of-sale registers.  To start using SumUp with your Prestashop website simply download the free module and connect it with your SumUp account. The attractive and customizable user interface of the module provides your customers with convenient, fast and easy card acceptance.

module.name: glotio
module.displayName: Glotio Automatic translation. First language at 50%off
module.description: Glotio is a reliable, easy-to-use and cost-effective automatic translation solution that also allows you to translate your store in more than 50 languages available
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Glotio is a reliable, easy-to-use and cost-effective automatic translation solution that also allows you to translate your store in more than 50 languages available. All this at an affordable and very economical price.
module.additional_description: Translate the first language at 50%off.The more you translate, the less you pay. Up to 25% discount for translating several languages at once.Keep your languages up to date. Add your content in your native language and Glotio will automatically translate it for you.Speak in the language of your customers. Internationalise your online shop and increase your sales.Translate like a professional and reduce translation costs. Improve SEO and generate more traffic by improving the positioning of your online shop by being in several languages.Generate data feeds and increase CPC by having your products translated on Google Shopping and other price comparison and marketplaces. International marketing campaigns. Translate any marketing campaigns you want to run to target the language of each market

module.name: engagebay
module.displayName: EngageBay - Marketing, Sales CRM & Live Chat
module.description: The Prestashop EngageBay Integration plugin can integrate your Prestashop orders , products, and customers with EngageBay CRM as Contacts or Leads
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: The Prestashop EngageBay Integration plugin can integrate your Prestashop orders , products, and customers with EngageBay CRM as Contacts or Leads.
module.additional_description: You can add/update order as a Contact or Lead automatically into EngageBay CRM when you add a new order or update an existing order on your site. You can also add/update Contacts or Leads automatically into EngageBay CRM when the customer adds/updates/registers on your site.  The operation is very simple. Once the module is installed, you can sync your catalog, your customers, and your orders. Therefore, you can manage your online orders and your offsite controls from within the same web interface. Generate more leads using our lead grabbing features like web pop ups, embed forms, landing pages. Engage and nurture the leads using marketing automation. Convert them into paying customers using the CRM, live chat features, also provide post sales support using our help desk module.

module.name: ps_accounts
module.description: Link your store to your PrestaShop account to take full advantage of the modules offered by the PrestaShop Marketplace and optimize your experience
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Link your store to your PrestaShop account to take full advantage of the modules offered by the PrestaShop Marketplace and optimize your experience.
module.additional_description: Save time configuring modulesOptimized PrestaShop account experience

module.name: ps_eventbus
module.description: PS EventBus is a companion module that is automatically deployed as a dependency when specific modules are installed on your PrestaShop store (see the list of modules concerned in the "Features&q
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: PS EventBus is a companion module that is automatically deployed as a dependency when specific modules are installed on your PrestaShop store (see the list of modules concerned in the "Features" tab). The PS EventBus module enables the synchronisation of technical and non-personal data between your shop and these other modules installed on your shop. This synchronisation is necessary for the good operation of the modules concerned. Uninstalling the PS EventBus module may cause these modules to crash or even stop working completely.

module.name: idetalivechat
module.description: Deploy a livechat and chatbot on your store to answer either automatically or by hand questions from your customers.Automate customer support and enable 24/7 support with AI
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Deploy a livechat and chatbot on your store to answer either automatically or by hand questions from your customers.Automate customer support and enable 24/7 support with AI.
module.additional_description: Better conversionIncreased number of leadsAutomation of customer careHuman Handover for quality

module.name: tidiolivechat
module.description: Tidio is an all-in-one customer experience solution with live chat, chatbots, Lyro AI chatbot, and multichannel communication
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Tidio is an all-in-one customer experience solution with live chat, chatbots, Lyro AI chatbot, and multichannel communication
module.additional_description: Provide the best possible customer service and increase your sales. Tidio is a customer experience platform that helps online stores provide customer service and turn website visitors into loyal customers. The platform offers plug-and-play sales and support chatbot templates designed to increase revenue and answer common customer questions. Tidio allows you to manage all your communication channels in one place and offers a variety of helpdesk tools for you and your team. What makes Tidio so effective in generating sales? Conversational AI Lyro that turns customer questions into chats and provides personalized support, just as a human support agent would Integrate your live chat, email inbox, Messenger, and Instagram into one multichannel communicator and answer your customers instantlyReady-to-use chatbot templates for answering repetitive questions and performing simple tasks. Whats morewe have used machine learning to make your bot understand your customers intentions.Actionable statistics that show how effective and useful for your customer are your chatbotsLive visitors list that shows who is visiting your website in real-time and allows you to monitor which part of your website they are browsing What differentiates Tidio? Automatically answer up to 70% of customer questions with Lyro AI chatbot for faster supportSimplicityit takes only 5 minutes to install the chat widget and start conversations with your customersUnique chatbot builder - 100% codelessBuilt-in sales and support chatbot templates Customizable widgetIntegrations with email, Messenger, InstagramA free mobile app for iOS and AndroidExcellent customer support available for you 24/5 Sample tactics you can implement in 5 minutes to boost your sales: Stop 60% of customers from abandoning their carts by offering a discount or free shippingWelcome every website visitor and encourage them to make purchases by giving personalized discounts o informing them about special offersSend a personalized message to those who want to leave your websiteWelcome returning visitors and customers with a personalized messageMonitor visitor activity and recommend best-selling productsRun upselling bot to increase the average order value Numbers behind Tidio One of the most popular live chat solution with over 300.000+ active users35+ built-in, ready to use chatbot templates24/5 live chat support to solve your problems and help you improve your business with TidioLyro AI chatbot solves up to 70% of customer problems with personalized conversations, helping you maximize your support capacity

module.name: vivawalletsmartcheckout
module.description: Viva.com | Smart Checkout gets better and smarter over time! Sign up with Viva.com to get a free payments gateway, your IBAN-enabled local merchant account, and a debit Mastercard for your expenses
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Viva.com | Smart Checkout gets better and smarter over time! Sign up with Viva.com to get a free payments gateway, your IBAN-enabled local merchant account, and a debit Mastercard for your expenses.
module.additional_description: 30+ payment methods. Accept cards, digital wallets, local payment methods, Online Banking & more.Up to 97.4% of customers proceed to pay when using Smart Checkout.Acceptance fees up to 0% by using your Viva Wallet MasterCard.Daily payout of your online sales to your account, even on weekends or holidays.The app is easy to set up and has no monthly fees or hidden costs. Allow customization of the look and feel of your checkout page through a graphical user interface.Reliable, state-of-the-art, cloud-based infrastructure so you don’t miss a payment.It is continually self-updated ensuring constant regulatory compliance and constant improvements to customer experience and conversion. Accept multiple payment methods including:Card Schemes:VisaMastercardAmerican ExpressMaestroBancontactJCBDiners Club InternationalDiscoverCartes Bancaires Digital Wallets:Apple PayGoogle PaySamsung PayPayPalPayPal Pay LaterViva Wallet Local Payment Methods:Bancontact QRBitPayBLIKEPSGiropayIDEALIRISKlarnaMB WAYMULTIBANCOP24PayconiqPayUSofortTbi BankTrustlyWeChat Pay Direct Debit & Other:SEPA Direct DebitPay by BankCash (Viva Spot)e-Banking (ΔΙΑΣ/DIAS)

module.name: prestasyncmaster
module.description: PrestaShop Sync Master service especially designed to perform import/update operations with the PrestaShop catalog
module.author: MyPrestaModules
module.description_full: PrestaShop Sync Master service especially designed to perform import/update operations with the PrestaShop catalog.
module.additional_description: Import & Update your product catalog smart and easily Let this service free you from manually managing your product catalog. File Formats Features CSV & Excel FormatsYou can use Excel formulas in your filesUpload your files directly from your PC, URL, FTP, SFTP, ZIP archiveUse your own, supplier, other store column format. Do not need to use fixed column format Images Import Import product images by URLs. Few images can be separated by a comma or in separate file columns. Also, you can import images for each combination. Categories Import Import categories by name or tree that often can be in different supplier files. Also, you can match categories from your file to store. Combinations Import For combinations import, you can have just combination values in your file. For stock updating, you can have just a combination quantity and SKU or barcode in your file. Import Conditions Disabling products that are out of stockImport/Skip new productsUpdate/Skip existing productsDisable, products that already are not available in your import fileSkip not needed products from importImport/Update products just from selected categories, suppliers, brands Smart Formulas & Custom Fields You can adjust all prices during import. You can create rules for different product categories or prices range.Round your prices during import to .99 or to .00Truncate product title or descriptionCreate tags from combination options, categoriesFilter products by any file columnAnd many more…

module.name: vosfacturesapp
module.description: Automatise, Customize, Send your invoices, Keep a continuous invoice numbering (if direct sales), Create credit notes, Export & Analyze your data… by integrating your account (including mul
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Automatise, Customize, Send your invoices, Keep a continuous invoice numbering (if direct sales), Create credit notes, Export & Analyze your data… by integrating your account (including multi-shops) with online invoicing software VosFactures.
module.additional_description: Increase productivity with Customization + Centralization + Accounting analysis of your invoices from your Prestashop and non-Prestashop sales.You want customised invoices?You want to keep a continuous numbering when selling outside of Prestashop?You want to centralize and export your data, and generate exports and accounting reports?The module meets these needs by integrating your Prestashop account with the multi-function invoicing software VosFactures: + Customized invoices templateLayout, numbering pattern, logo, T&C, mentions ...Ability to choose from 18 templates to customize or to create your own format+ Automatic and manual invoice creationWith or without: VAT, discount, shipping costs, Paypal costs...+ Easy creation of credit notesTotal or partial+ Sending by email (optional) For electronic invoicing+ Centralized and secure archiving of your dataInvoices, Customers, Products, Payments.Data Search engine (per period, customer ...)+ Exports and AnalysisExports to Excel, PDF, zip, json, xml, zip.Financial reports : VAT by rate, Income ...Accounting logs compatible with accounting softwareOnline accountant access+ Multi-Store CompatibilityCustomization of invoices by shop or group of shopsSearch, export and analysis by shop or group of shops And many more features !

module.name: zotaboxps
module.description: Increase your sales and email subscribers with 20+ promotional sales tools from Zotabox. Your package includes multiple popups, banners, countdown timers, coupons, testimonials & social feed
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Increase your sales and email subscribers with 20+ promotional sales tools from Zotabox. Your package includes multiple popups, banners, countdown timers, coupons, testimonials & social feed.
module.additional_description: YOUR ZOTABOX PACKAGE INCLUDES:Easy Popup – to promote your specials and increase your subscribers with custom images, timers and couponsHeader Bar – to promote your specials and increase your subscribers. Countdown timer and coupons included.Landing Page Builder – create new landing pages with easeSlider – slide out box to promote specials, video, collect emails etc.Push Notifications – collect subscribers and send out push notificationsContact Form Builder – customize fields, departments, attach files, auto-response etc.Facebook Live Chat – Support your customers via FacebookSocial Buttons – encourage followers to join your siteEasy Store Locator – make it easy for your customers to find youTestimonial – have your customers promote for youSocial Review – automatically display your latest facebook or google reviewsNotification Box – fade in notification boxes to promote your productsStickers – promote latest news, new arrivals, blogs etcPromo Box – to promote sales, products, new arrivalsEasy Banner – upload your custom image and link to any pageSocial Mobile Tools – so customers can contact you on mobileEU Cookie Notification – ask EU visitors to accept cookiesBack to Top Buttons – enhanced, stylish back to top buttonsEXTRA FEATURES:Zotabox is integrated with 20+ email service providers including Mailchimp, Constant Contact, Aweber, Get Response & Campaign Monitor etc.Zotabox is also integrated with 20 + social accounts including Facebook, Twitter, Google Plus, Youtube, Instagram, Pinterest, Linked In etc.Add countdown timers, custom images, coupons, email capture fields to toolsLoads asynchronously. Won’t slow down your website.No coding needed. Fully customizable.Google Analytics and Facebook Pixel IntegrationCustom CSS and Custom HTML availableUser-friendly and responsive design.Mobile friendlyTARGETING RULES INCLUDE:Display on Certain PagesTime on SiteScroll Down PageMinimum Screen SizeExit Intent (for some tools)New, Returning VisitorSet Display/Expire DateGeo Targeting

module.name: prestashop_globale
module.description: Global-e is the leading end-to-end cross-border solutions provider and the chosen partner of hundreds of global retailers and brands around the world
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Global-e is the leading end-to-end cross-border solutions provider and the chosen partner of hundreds of global retailers and brands around the world.
module.additional_description: Via our certified PrestaShop integration, merchants can deploy a seamless localized shopping experience on their existing online store and boost their online sales worldwide in a fast and cost-effective manner. Global-e makes cross-border ecommerce as simple as domestic sales. End-to-end operations – streamlining international logistics including shipping, customs, customer service and returns.Risk management and regulation – eliminating fraud and currency fluctuation risks, managing country restrictions and import processing.Best practices and local market knowledge - unique BI model based on advanced big-data analysis to support your performance KPIs and hit optimal conversion rates.

module.name: cedconnector
module.description: Miravia Connector module helps to automate & streamline major eCommerce operations by seamlessly connecting your PrestaShop store with the Miravia marketplace, and manage products, orders, & inventory
module.author: CedCommerce
module.description_full: Miravia Connector module helps to automate & streamline major eCommerce operations by seamlessly connecting your PrestaShop store with the Miravia marketplace, and manage products, orders, & inventory streamlining your sales.
module.additional_description: Streamlined inventory management: With integration, merchants can easily manage and update their product inventory across both platforms.Easy order fulfillment: Integration allows easy order fulfillment and tracking, reducing the need for manual work and minimizing the risk of errors.Better analytics: Having all your sales data in one place make it easier to analyze sales, allowing you to make a data-driven decision.Cost savings: The integration eliminates the need to manually process and fulfill orders from multiple platforms. This can save merchants time and money in the long run.

module.name: ldinstagramslider
module.displayName: Instagram feed Slider - Create your custom feed slider
module.description: This module for Prestashop displays the latest Instagram posts with over 450 design combinations. It provides a visually appealing way to showcase your brand's social media presence
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: This module for Prestashop displays the latest Instagram posts with over 450 design combinations. It provides a visually appealing way to showcase your brand's social media presence. Simply insert your username.
module.additional_description: Increased visibility on social mediaImproved brand imageBetter engagement with customersIncreased website trafficPotential new followers on Instagram

module.name: pluginhiveshipping
module.description: Live shipping rates at PrestaShop checkout, print shipping labels & track orders easily
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Live shipping rates at PrestaShop checkout, print shipping labels & track orders easily. The app supports UPS, FedEx, DHL Express, DHL Paket, PostNord, Australia Post, Canada Post, USPS, Parcelforce, Aramex, Blue Dart, TNT & 40+ carriers.
module.additional_description: Accurate Shipping Rates: Showing carrier-calculated shipping rates at checkout can prevent you from undercharging or overcharging customers, resulting in better customer satisfaction and fewer shipping-related issues. Print Shipping Labels: Printing shipping labels directly within your Prestashop store can help reduce human error and ensure that the correct shipping information is included on the label. Improved Customer Experience: Sending live tracking notifications to customers can improve the customer experience by keeping them informed of their shipment's progress and reducing anxiety about delivery times. Streamlined Shipping: The ability to add multiple carriers and automate shipping saves you time and effort, allowing you to focus on other aspects of your business. Expanded Customer Base: Using primary postal operators and global carriers can increase your customer base by offering more shipping options and reaching customers in different regions.

module.name: kevin
module.description: kevin. is a payment infrastructure that lets shoppers conveniently pay directly from their bank account (A2A). Add kevin
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: kevin. is a payment infrastructure that lets shoppers conveniently pay directly from their bank account (A2A). Add kevin. plugin to your store and benefit from an increased customer base, fair-priced transactions, and much quicker settlements.
module.additional_description: One payment partner, many benefits:Better-converting checkout.Create a streamlined checkout process that your customers will trust without the friction of third-party windows. Fewer fees. More savings.Improve your business bottom line without costly card fees. Get the freedom to focus on what matters most growing your business. Shorter settlement time.Get paid faster and improve cash flow by letting customers pay for goods or services directly from their bank account to yours. A no-code solution.We developed kevin. plugin with a smooth user experience in mind so that anyone can install and use it easily. Unlock the potential of account-to-account payment - add kevin. plugin to your store today.

module.name: aplaceautocomplete
module.description: Use the APlace.io service to add address autocompletion in your store's order form
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Use the APlace.io service to add address autocompletion in your store's order form.
module.additional_description: Introducing APlace.io: Enhance Your Applications with Powerful Tools APlace.io is a service that empowers developers to seamlessly integrate robust geolocation tools into their applications. With features such as address autocompletion, reverse geocoding, and access to points of interest near a location, APlace.io revolutionizes the way you interact with geospatial data. APlace.io Address Autocomplete Module - Add address autocompletion with APlace.io Are you tired of grappling with inaccurate mailing addresses and dealing with delivery mishaps? Look no further than our Address Autocomplete module, exclusively designed to improve your store's order form. While currently available only in Europe, we are working tirelessly to expand its reach globally. By adding this module, you can significantly enhance your cart conversion rates, amplify user satisfaction, and provide an overall superior shopping experience for your customers.

module.name: illow
module.displayName: Cookie banner - your website privacy compliance
module.description: illow is a consent management banner that makes your website compliant with all current and upcoming Data-Privacy regulations in just a few minutes
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: illow is a consent management banner that makes your website compliant with all current and upcoming Data-Privacy regulations in just a few minutes. Cookie banner, policies, customization, consent logs, multiple languages, Fines Protector and more.
module.additional_description: Ensure Compliance: Our cookie banner solution helps businesses ensure they are complying with data privacy regulations, reducing the risk of legal penalties and reputational harm. Fines protector: illow guarantees you’ll never have to pay a fine related to cookie consent. With Fines Protector, illow takes care of any fines so you can relax and focus on your business. Build Trust: By providing a compliant cookie banner, businesses can build trust with their customers by showing they take data privacy seriously. Customizable Design: Our solution offers customizable design options, allowing businesses to match their banner to their brand and website aesthetic. Easy Implementation: Our cookie banner is easy to implement, reducing the time and effort needed to set up a compliant solution. Comply with all global privacy regulations:

module.name: rockpos
module.description: Rock POS is the best Prestashop Point of Sale module that has significantly helped thousands of brick-and-mortar stores increase revenues from faster sales, bigger carts/orders, cost reduction, data s
module.author: Hamsa
module.description_full: Rock POS is the best Prestashop Point of Sale module that has significantly helped thousands of brick-and-mortar stores increase revenues from faster sales, bigger carts/orders, cost reduction, data synchronization, and customers’ loyalty enhancement
module.additional_description: 1. SELL FAST! SELL MORE! Enjoying an amazing stream of revenues to your store with a simple yet speedy check-out process for every cart/order. 2. FOCUS ON WHAT MATTERS!Reducing your management time, costs, and risks thanks to a systematic point-of-sale (POS) report on the most important factors (sales, orders, cart size, employee’s performance). 3. KEEP YOUR CUSTOMERS COMING BACK!Developing great relationships with your customers by smooth integration with top customer loyalty modules. 4. EASILY GROW YOUR BUSINESS!Managing the business of your current physical store and developing new brick-and-mortar stores through Rock POS with no complexity, no time-consuming study but just a few clicks. (And YES, our point of sale (POS) module does support multiple stores). 5. YOU ARE NOT ALONE!Optimizing the benefits of Rock POS to your store by having our Superhero support team as your in-need companion.

module.name: cedconnectoraliexpress
module.description: Rev up your business growth with AliExpress PrestaShop integration for real-time data synchronization, seamless inventory management, and hassle-free bulk product upload
module.author: CedCommerce
module.description_full: Rev up your business growth with AliExpress PrestaShop integration for real-time data synchronization, seamless inventory management, and hassle-free bulk product upload.
module.additional_description: Operating in 220 countries and regions globally, AliExpress is a widespread platform.With services available in 18 languages, AliExpress ensures accessibility to buyers worldwide.Over 150 million customers trust AliExpress, relying on the reliability of its sellers.AliExpress supports 38 local payment channels, allowing payment in local currency across 51 countries.Sellers on AliExpress benefit from access to marketing tools and resources to expand their audience.

module.name: acumbamail
module.description: Intuitive email marketing platform for every kind of business (from freelancers and SMBs to enterprises and institutions)
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Intuitive email marketing platform for every kind of business (from freelancers and SMBs to enterprises and institutions). Has everything needed to create a 360º communication strategy and easily manage different channels from a single platform.
module.additional_description: Build email marketing campaigns, automated digital workflows, and responsive landing pages within a single and easy to use platform.

module.name: stocksync
module.description: Stock Sync is an advanced inventory management tool that enables seamless synchronization of stock levels across over multiple platforms and suppliers
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Stock Sync is an advanced inventory management tool that enables seamless synchronization of stock levels across over multiple platforms and suppliers.
module.additional_description: Automated Inventory Management: Automatically updates inventory levels across multiple sales channels in scheduled time, reducing the risk of overselling and underselling.Flexible Feed Management: Offers a variety of methods to update inventory, including FTP/SFTP, email, URL, Google Sheets, and direct integrations with suppliers and platforms.Customizable Scheduling: Users can set custom schedules for inventory updates, ensuring that product availability is always current without manual intervention.Dynamic Pricing: Enables dynamic pricing strategies, allowing users to automatically adjust prices based on predefined rules and conditions.Easy to Use: Designed with a user-friendly interface that simplifies inventory and order management for businesses of all sizes.Scalability: Perfect for businesses of all sizes, from small online stores to large enterprises, thanks to its ability to handle large volumes of products and complex inventory management needs.Support for Dropshipping: Simplifies the process of managing dropshipped products, enabling seamless coordination between suppliers and sales channels.Reduced Manual Workload: Minimizes the need for manual data entry and updates, freeing up valuable time for other business operations.By leveraging Stock Sync, businesses can optimize their inventory management processes, enhance operational efficiency, and ultimately drive sales growth.
